Authors: Nurbadi R., Amyus A., Pratama B., Fawwaz Kanz A., Nurul Fajar A., Wang G., Sfenrianto
Title: Implementation of Smart Travel System for Support Travel and Accommodation Industry
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Nurbadi, R., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Amyus, A., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Pratama, B., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fawwaz Kanz, A., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Nurul Fajar, A., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wang, G., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sfenrianto, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Smart Travel System that called To-Tour is an important component in Travelling and Accommodation Services. There are variety and different organization for support the integration mechanism. We proposed the concept of implementation about travel reservation solution that called To-Tour for use by travellers using on Service Oriented Analysis and Design Approach, specifically in Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). To-Tour is a Tour Travel Agency offering any trips from different vendor, and provide any variety features such as hotel, restaurant, car & motorcycle rent, trip destination, tour package, tour guide, merchandise, train, flight and the other feature in one platform application. Service Oriented Analysis and Design can combine any entities from different providers that can be integrated together to provide Smart Travel System services for travellers. To-Tour system is also designed to develop the tourism industries in Indonesia could appealing to any different travels segments. To-Tour is a new way to reservation any services for travel on one application. Smart Travel System is solution in Indonesia, the travellers can search various travels or other services in our application. © 2019 Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.
Index Keywords: Information services; Design approaches; Integration mechanisms; Service Oriented; System services; Tour guide; Tourism industry; Travel agency; Travel reservations; Service oriented architecture (SOA)

Authors: Nurbadi R., Amyus A., Pratama B., Kanz A.F., Fajar A.N.
Title: Smart Travel System Based on Service Oriented Architecture
Source title: 1st 2018 Indonesian Association for Pattern Recognition International Conference, INAPR 2018 - Proceedings
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Nurbadi, R., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Amyus, A., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Pratama, B., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kanz, A.F., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Recent advancements in Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) is the solution to align an Information Technology towards business goals. Since variety of travel services may come from different departments and same type of the travel services may have several providers. This paper proposed for combining any various travel service in one application including travel reservation services and give an additional features. How to integrate these services from different departments for travelers to provide ease of use cross platform and travel services has become an important in Smart Travel System (STS). ESB is the primary function to exchange the transformation of protocol, message or data. According to the ESB, STS is a way to provide the travel services that can give an experience for travelers in reservation any travel services from any devices in one application. This paper is proposed to answer about the problem of travel service providers in Indonesia, which have many features in one application that can be used from various platforms. These features consist of travel packages, booking airline tickets, buses, trains, hotel reservations, tour guides, looking for nearby attractions, car motorcycle rentals, and souvenirs. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: ESB; Service Oriented Architecture (SOA); Smart Travel System; Travel Services
Index Keywords: Architecture; Computer architecture; Information services; Metadata; Pattern recognition; Reservation systems; Airline tickets; Business goals; Cross-platform; Primary functions; Smart Travel System; Travel packages; Travel reservation service; Travel services; Service oriented architecture (SOA)

Authors: Pratama B., Sfenrianto S., Fajar A.N., Amyus A., Nurbadi R.
Title: A smart agriculture systems based on service oriented architecture
Source title: Proceedings - 2018 3rd International Conference on Information Technology, Information Systems and Electrical Engineering, ICITISEE 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Pratama, B., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sfenrianto, S., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Amyus, A., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Nurbadi, R., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Master of Information Systems Management, BINUS Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Recently, technology has been advancing very fast because of the use of information technology and the ability to obtain needs that exist in various places. Furthermore, the development of Service Oriented Architecture technology is now adopted in various fields. The use of Smart Agriculture System can help people who work in an agricultural sector. Components in Smart Agriculture Systems integrated an entity such as hotel, hospital, logistic, restaurant, supermarket and traditional market who can get a message, information, and data throughout Enterprise Service Bus (ESB). Service Oriented Architecture help to share information and data very quickly because using SOA connects various actors in the material sales industry. The usage of SOA in the field of agriculture is expected to help the economy in Indonesia and also can suppress prices so it will not soar. This high price is caused by various factors such as lack of technological knowledge among farmers. There are still many brokers who become third parties from the distribution of agricultural food ingredients in Indonesia. With the implementation of SOA, it is expected to help farmers for a better living. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Agriculture; Enterprise Service Bus; Service Oriented Architecture; Smart Agriculture Systems
Index Keywords: Agriculture; Information services; Information systems; Information use; Agricultural foods; Agricultural sector; Enterprise service bus; High price; Smart agricultures; Technological knowledge; Third parties; Traditional markets; Service oriented architecture (SOA)
